notes: Another gem from the archives of ELIZA DANE. A close associate of MAL REYNOLDS, Eliza also aims to misbehave. Eliza has appeared in adventures such as YOUR ATTITUDE IS VERY BAD, GREEN LETTER DAYS - A DRAMA IN TWO ACTS, and most recently I AM NOT HEAR FOR A JOKE OK.

Mrs Wallace Kelly



28 May 
We wished to clarify our role as the PACIFIC FINANCE LTD concerning this effect. 1).We need your correspondence information's and contact for fast communication and to verify your true identifications before any effect. 2).You are binding to provide the following Legal authorization of ownership of the said fund to enable us complete the formalities required to move the fund from our Firm before the transfer to either your designated account or to your desire Correspondence Bank. In proceeding it requires you to seek assistance of a financial lawyer of this country to procured this below listed documents for you in the ministry of the Justice and Finance here and submitted to us before transfer.Because this is a huge amount involved the funds can not be transfer without documentation. a). Letter of authorization or Power of attorneyb). Letter of Probatec). Certificate of Deposit These authorizations are mandatory because both primary and secondary beneficiary of the said fund has to be declared to the government as none citizen of this country to avoid the inflation of the rigid tax that may be claim over the releasing of the fund to your designated Bank or correspondence institute. I hereby advised that; you should employ the service of a legal representative here in United Kingdom to help you facilitate the issuing of the approvals whereby you have the alternative of contacting our solicitor which his address is indicated below and this must involved the awareness of your partner. Legal Advocate Contacts; PACIFIC FINANCE LTD C.ILynon Dennis Esq.Tel: +447011146569E-mail: lynondennisesq@yahoo.comI/C:Lynon Dennis Esq. Finally,obliged the provision of the deposit documents to enable us verify your matter and begin our action as per your request. Thanks for your anticipation, Respectively yours Management ConsultantTelex and Remittance DepartmentMrs Wallace Kelly.

messages.body:
This bait has violence (well, hints of it), deviant sex (again, just hints) more than hints, really, and Lad frustration... quite a bit of it actually.
There's also a lot of swearing... but this is an Eliza Dane bait, so it should be no surprise.


The Scammers

, "an Auditor of a Bank of Scotland... in London" (but actually living in a village somewhere) - he's had a really tragic life; header analysis placed him squarely in (predictably) Nigeria
, Lad Lawyer and control freak
Mrs Wallace Kelly, of Pacific Finance - to whom formatting is a lost art
Hendricks Michael, brought in to ease Eliza's financial burdens (how nice)
Williams John, one of Lynon Dennis' WU identities - and displaying a familiar Lad quirk of an apparent surname as a first name. 
Linda Town, Lind Town's ailing wife - originally mother; small town life can be sorta sordid...
Gerald Wharfe Whitley, a proposed replacement lawyer
, probably meant to be Wallace Kelly, but the Lad slipped up


The Baiters

, petulant and spoiled Odin-worshipping Sydney-based photomodel with a foul mouth
, Eliza's protective older brother, a Captain in the elite Special Air Services Regiment
Brett, a wealthy playboy with slightly odd tastes
, Eliza's photographer boyfriend
Freyja, Hel, Odin, Skadhi, Tyr - Deities of the Norse Pantheon, often invoked by Eliza

23 May 
I have a new email address!You can now email me at: lind_town22@yahoo.co.uk
- #142 Brampton Road,Central London SW3 1HY,United Kingdom.      

Dear friend, I know that this mail will come to you out of the blue as a total  Surprise. Well, I have a business proposal which I know might interest you. I believe that you would be in a position to assist me in my bid to transfer the sum of (?18.5M.) Eighteen Million Five Hundred Thousand British Pounds into a foreign bank account. So study the following account carefully and reply urgently. I am Mr. Lind Town, an Auditor of a Bank of Scotland here in London.  During the course of our auditing, I discovered a floating fund in an account opened in the bank in 1999 and since 2000 nobody has operated on this account. After a lot of investigation I discovered that the owner of the bank account died without a beneficiary. The money is floating and if I do not remit this money out it will be forfeited for nothing. The owner of the account is Mr. Kurt Kahle, a foreigner. He died since july 2000 with his only son Michael and lovely wife. and the bank account has no other beneficiary. (
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm) My investigation proved to me that nobody knows about this account or anything concerning it. So I want to grab this opportunity, as it is no harm to nobody.  I am here soliciting for your assistance as a foreigner because the  Money cannot be approved to anybody here. But It can be approved to a  Foreigner with valid international passport or driver?s license and foreign bank account because the money at sake is in British Pound sterling and the former owner of the account is a foreigner. The management must approve this payment to you if you have the correct information of this account, which I will give to you, upon your positive response and once I am convinced that you are capable and will meet up with instruction of key bank official who is deeply involved with me in this project. 
With my influence and the position of the bank officials, we can Transfer this money to any foreigner?s reliable account, which you can provide with assurance that this money will be intact pending our physical arrival at your end for sharing. 
Note that an existing foreign bank account or an empty account can serve to receive this money. The banks official will destroy all documents of the transaction immediately this money is into your nominated bank account. 
At the conclusion of this business, you will be given 40% of the total  Amount, 55% will be for the bank official and I, while 5% will be for  Expenses both parties might have incurred during the course of this Transaction.  All I require is your honest and full co-operation to enable us see  This deal through. I guarantee you that this will be executed under a  Legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law. To enable us get the necessary legal documents and approval in your name for the release of these funds to your designated bank account, Please do provide the following information's as soon as I get the information below complete the transfer will be made in less than two weeks. Endeavor to reply as soon as possible so that we can be able to start  The process of claim.  Regards, Mr. Lind Town.  



 (PDF)

Mr Town,Yes, I read the link you gave me. 
My first question would be why I'd have anything to do with the IRS or the Secret Service as I'm not an American and you haven't threatened the President or anything. Anyway...
1. Your Full Names: Elizabeth Danielle Dane
2. Your Full Contact Address: 35 Westmoreland Grove Glebe Sydney NSW Australia 2125
3. Your Occupation: Photomodel
4. Date of Birth/Age: 12 August 1984/23
5. Marital Status: Single, but I don't know why this should matter
6. Your personal Telephone/Cell Phone and Fax Numbers for effective communication between us.
Here we have a problem. I share a house with four other women, two of them incurable stickybeaks. Any call could be picked up by someone else, or overheard, and you can kiss secrecy goodbye. As for my mobile... I changed plans recently, and while I'm waiting for the new telco to connect me, the old telco cut me off. My mobile just sits on my belt now as a fashion accessory.
Over to you I guess.
Regards,
Eliza Dane

messages.body:
Mr Town,While I'm sorry for your mum's condition and understand your concerns, we're up against some cold hard facts here.
While I - actually we, since my income is something me and my boyfriend make - might make $10000-$12000 a month, it doesn't mean we have that on hand. We don't keep cash lying around on the off-chance. A lot goes into topping up an account set up to buy outright what we need to set up AJ's own studio, and we can't touch that. 
We also have a joint account, and if I made an unexplained withdrawal as big as Mr Dennis wants, AJ would notice and want to know why. I'm not prepared to lie to him.
Also - you tell me to write to Mr Dennis and beg - I don't do begging. It's against my religion. 
This whole situation would be so much better if he did what AFAIK every other fucking lawyer does, and got paid at the end of business. 
Eliza Dane

messages.body:
Mr Town,I swear by Odin and Freyja that I did not tell  about this.  I have no idea how he might have found out. I've tried to call him, but he's returned to base in WA, and there are only so many messages I can leave.
Let me explain something.  is ten years older than me. He loves me dearly - Mum and Dad say he spoiled me. But he was there for me, there to help when his 'kid sister' was in any sort of trouble.
The day he joined the Army I was proud and sad; proud because I knew he was tough and strong and the best there is, sad because the Army was his family too. When I heard he'd joined the SAS, I was proud again, because the SAS is the best in the world. 
He always wrote to me and emailed me during his duty in East Timor and Afghanistan, saying that I was the reason he and all his comrades fought, because I'm what the war on terror is about - the freedom of half the human race, as he puts it; women everywhere.
He has never lied to me. When he says that you are not who you say you are, I listen to him. I don't know how to resolve this. I'm going to raise my soul to Father Odin before Yggdrassil, and receive His wisdom.
Eliza Dane
